name: Software Tester / QA Engineer
description:
Job Overview:

You will perform functional, integration and regression testing of some web-applications as well as mobile applications. In our products we use such technologies as HTML5, CSS 3, Vue.js, Thymeleaf, Webpack, Java and Spring Boot, Oracle, PostgresQL and Kafka regarding databases, AWS, ELK and GIT. Both options are available: working remote or relocation to our Back office in Montenegro.

What Will You Do?

  • Perform Analysis of project requirements
  • Compose and maintain checklists, test cases
  • Do functional, integration and regression testing
  • Detect and fix bugs using the bug-tracking system (Jira)
  • Perform testing analysis
  • Prepare test reports (result, test coverage, etc.)

Requirements

  • 3 years or more as a Test Engineer
  • Functional and Integration testing
  • Web applications testing
  • Mobile applications testing
  • English language skills B2 or above

Good to have:

  • Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS;
  • Experience with HTTP requests;
  • Experience working in browser Developer console (page source code, requests, etc.);
  • SQL at the level of writing the simplest queries;
  • Experience working with JIRA

Benefits

  • Work by the seaside or mountains in a fun and friendly environment
  • Competitive salary available in euro / crypto
  • Quarterly Bonus based on Company Performance
  • Employer-paid relocation for the employee and immediate family/partner
  • 21 working days of annual leave plus 14 days public holidays
  • Annual reimbursement of flight home for employee and family
  • Corporate Events & Team Building Activities
  • Udemy for Business Unlimited Membership and Language training courses
  • The opportunity to excel in your professional career
